markings: LRC: red collector seal: 林忠正 {Hayashi Tadamasa}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
provenance: Hayashi Tadamasa (until June 2, 1902; Drouot lot 387), G. Bullier (ca. 1910-14), Tokyo auction cat. no. 43 (Oct. 1919) bought by Yamanaka and sold to Henry P. Garland (1920-36), Louis V. Ledoux (1936-48); Roland Koscherak (around 1948); Richard P. Gale (until 1974)
text: First edition with the woman wearing a black-striped obi. A later edition has her wearing a purple obi with lozenge pattern.
title: Lovers Under a Single Umbrella
